Base class for 'Range' objects.
Range(int) - Constructor for class stlib.datatypes.range.Range
Simple constructor to create an empty 'RangeIF' object with the specified initial capacity
RangeIF<T extends GeneralTypeIF & Orderable<T>> - Interface in stlib.interfaces.range
Interface that should be provided by objects of type RangeIF

Concrete class for representation of 'RangeInt' objects.

RangeIntIF - Interface in stlib.interfaces.range

Rectangle - Class in stlib.datatypes.spatial.util
Class to represent rectangle objects, generally used for representing the bounding box of spatial objects

Constructor for a rectangle
Rectangle(RectangleIF) - Constructor for class stlib.datatypes.spatial.util.Rectangle
Copy constructor for a rectangle, creates a new rectangle based on the passed rectangle
RectangleIF - Interface in stlib.interfaces.spatial.util
Interface for RectangleIF objects, generally used for representing the bounding box of spatial objects
Region - Class in stlib.datatypes.spatial
This class represents spatial objects of type 'Region'
Region(boolean) - Constructor for class stlib.datatypes.spatial.Region
Constructor for an empty 'Region' object.
Region(FaceIF) - Constructor for class stlib.datatypes.spatial.Region
Creates a simple 'Region' object with one 'FaceIF'.
Region(List<PointIF>) - Constructor for class stlib.datatypes.spatial.Region
Creates a simple 'Region' object with one 'Face' without holes by passing a list of points which define the outer boundary.
RegionIF - Interface in stlib.interfaces.spatial
Interface that should be provided by spatial objects of type region
rightAdjacent(IntervalIF<T>) - Method in class stlib.datatypes.interval.Interval

rightAdjacent(IntervalIF<T>) - Method in interface stlib.interfaces.range.RangeIF

rightClosed - Variable in class stlib.datatypes.interval.Interval

rightPoint - Variable in class stlib.datatypes.spatial.util.Segment
